sqlMap.insert: insert into semi_address_groups (group_no, group_name, emp_no, group_seq) values (semi_addr_groups_seq.nextval, #name#, #empNo#, (select nvl(max(group_seq) + 1, 1) from semi_address_groups where emp_no = #empNo#))
sqlMap.select: select group_no as no, group_name as name, group_address_count as addressCount, group_seq as seq, group_deleted as deleted, group_created_date as createdDate, group_updated_date as updatedDate, group_deleted_date as deletedDate, emp_no as empNo from semi_address_groups where emp_no = #value#

select group_no as no, group_name as name, group_address_count as addressCount, group_seq as seq, group_deleted as deleted, group_created_date as createdDate, group_updated_date as updatedDate, group_deleted_date as deletedDate, emp_no as empNo from (select row_number() over (order by group_no desc) row_numbers, group_no, group_name, group_address_count, group_seq, group_deleted, group_created_date, group_updated_date, group_deleted_date, emp_no from semi_address_groups where group_deleted = 'N' ) where row_numbers between #begin# and #end#

select group_no as no, group_name as name, group_address_count as addressCount, group_seq as seq, group_deleted as deleted, group_created_date as createdDate, group_updated_date as updatedDate, group_deleted_date as deletedDate, emp_no as empNo from semi_address_groups where group_no = #value#
